title: Hello
about: I'm passionate about building simple, clean, Responsive Modern Website User Interfaces that are easy to use, compatible with all major browsers and devices in XHTML / HTML5, CSS / CSS3, jQuery / Javascript and AngularJS, with more than 5 years of experience in web-techologies @ Srishti Softwares [Nov 2009 - Dec 2010] , ISPG Technologies [Dec 2010 - Nov 2013] & Sapient [Nov 2013 - Present]
